text_block_list.text:
After a training session I saw 
Seiun Sky looking at something on her phone.

Haa… Such a comfy design, 
and that cute, curly tail…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
For this perfect gem to fit in the palm of my hand, 
this truly is the perfect form of therapy.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Ah, don't worry about it.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
More importantly, Trainer-san, 
are you free on your next day off?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I was thinking of getting a new pair of shoes and was 
wondering if you'd like to come and look at some with me.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Great, then let's go to the mall this weekend!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
On my next day off, Seiun Sky and I 
went to a shopping mall that had a sports store.

Hmm, now where's that 
sporting goods store at…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Oh…?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Nothing, I just saw something intriguing is all.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Isn't that mug in that 
store over there super cute?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
When I looked to where she was pointing, 
I noticed a mug with a cat painted on it.

Haa… The cat on that mug looks 
so comfy, like it's about to fall asleep.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I'd feel much more motivated if I could have a 
cup of tea out of it before every training session.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
What should I do…? 
Should I buy it…? Oh!?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Trainer-san, look over there!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
It says, "buy two mugs and 
get a cat-shaped keyholder for free!"
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I didn't realize this before, but if I buy two mugs 
I'd also get that super cute cat-shaped keyholder too!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
That's great value! 
I want them both so bad!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
But I wouldn't have a 
use for two mugs… Hmm…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
After thinking about it for 
some time, Seiun Sky said…
Ah, I've got it…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, I've got a completely 
unrelated question to ask you…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san… 
Do you happen to own a mug?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
If I remember correctly, 
I'm pretty sure you don't have one.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Oh? I have no idea what you're talking about.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
We just happened to pass by here, and 
just so happened to see that mug with 
the cute cat on it that I want.
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
You seem like the type of person to use mugs… 
Plus, if you don't have one, 
now's the perfect time to get one, doncha think?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Come on now, imagine this. Right before 
training, you and your Uma Musume are both 
drinking tea out of matching mugs…
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Symbolizing the deep bond between us… 
Wouldn't that be wonderful?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Plus, I know for a fact it would help make me feel more pumped for training… *Glance* *Glance* *Glance* *Glance*
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Oh, really?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Ahaha, now that's my trainer!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
You're pretty good at making sure your Uma 
Musume's motivation is always as high as can be, huh?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Now then, why don't we each buy one?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: Wha…?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
I had Seiun Sky wait there and 
decided to pay for the mugs on my own.

Wowie! Trainer-san, you're so mature! 
And so cool!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text: To think you'd pay for my mug too!
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Sei-chan's bond level has 
risen by one once again. Pirorirorin ♪
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
choice_data_list: Well, you're in a good mood.
Well, you're in a good mood.

text_block_list.text:
Hehe… To say that after buying that mug for me. 
Trainer-san, you're not being 
honest with your feelings, are you?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky

text_block_list.text:
Now then, why don't we head back 
home and drink some tea out of these mugs?
text_block_list.name: Seiun Sky
